name: NTR MEMORIAL TRUST

address: NTR Trust Bhavan, Road-2, Banjara Hills

briefDescription: NTR Trust is one of the leading not-for-profits in the state of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana. Through our programmatic verticals - Healthcare, Education, Empowerment & Livelihood, Sujala, Arts & Culture and Disaster Response and Relief - we have positively impacted the lives of more than 1.6 million people.
